data.value: As our T-shirts are simple and essential, everyone can mix and match them with their own unique styles at any time.
data.placeholder: As our T-shirts are simple and essential, everyone can mix and match them with their own unique styles at any time.

styles.styles: {"all":{"&":"align-self: stretch; color: var(--Theme-J-maple, #C63A41); text-align: center; font-family: Sofia; font-size: 64px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; line-height: 150% /* 96px */; margin: 0px;","& > .pf-flex-section":""}}
